context_bundle.summary: Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) workflow modeling for task dependencies, topological sorting, and parallel execution optimization

onboarding.quick_start: Model workflow as DAG with tasks (nodes) and dependencies (edges), use topological sort for execution order, parallelize independent tasks
common_patterns: Topological sort: Kahn's algorithm for dependency resolution
In-degree calculation: Count dependencies for each task
Parallel execution: Identify tasks with all dependencies complete
Cycle detection: Verify DAG is acyclic (no circular dependencies)
known_errors: Circular dependencies cause deadlocks (must validate DAG)
Critical path determines minimum workflow duration
